json.Text: GAME　PAUSE Do you want to end now? You have ${##} free pause(s).After that, each pause will cost you ${##} pts.
GAME　PAUSE Do you want to end now? You have no free pauses.This pause will cost you ${##} pts.
HOW TO PLAY Daub the correct number. Tap the button to call bingo. ${##} points will be deducted if you tap the blue one. Tip: Earn more with multi-bingos and boosts!
BINGO TYPES There are many ways to earn bingos. 5 Across 5 Down 5 Diagonally 4 in the Corners Tip:Get more bingos to earn multi-bingo bonus points!
THE KEY TO HIGH SCORE Get more bingos to earn multi-bingo bonus points!
BOOST! Daub quickly and correctly to earn a boost faster! The boost will be cleared and you will lose ${##} points if you daub wrong.
WILD DAUB Daub the lit numbers as quickly and correctly as possible within limited seconds.
FREE BALL Place a daub anywhere on any card. Tip: Try to choose a number that forms multi-bingos.
GOLDEN BALL Select the ball you think is best. Tip: Before using, look for numbers that can make a bingo or that appear on multiple cards.
Select a number to practice magic, it will change into the number below. MAGIC DAUB SELECT A NUMBER TO CHANGE
SKIP BALL Skip the current countdown to the next number. Tip: You can save time by skipping numbers you don't have.
SCORE Get Perfect! for a very fast daub. Get Great! for a fast daub. Get Nice! for a slow daub. The faster you daub, the more Boosts you will earn to help complete bingos!
SUPER WILD DAUB! Would you like to ge a Super Wild Daub? Daub the lit number as quickly and correctly as possible within the time limit.
Video is unavailable currently...
MORE FREE BALL Would you like to get a Free Ball? Free Ball can be used to daub any number.
SCORE CORRECT DAUBS: SPEED BONUS: BINGO(S): MULTI-BINGO(S): CARD BINGO(S): PENALTY: TOTAL:
The prop can't be used on the current card.

<size=30>Choose a different 
number to change.</size>

SPECIAL RULES The more points you get, the more bonus you win. Get as many bingos as possible during the ${##} minutes. Continue to another card when you complete one. Make the most of the 3 boosts above to achieve more bingos and higher scores. Good Luck!
Welcome! Before having a match, let’s learn some controls.
Use this to place a daub anywhere on the card.
Use this to select the ball you think works best.
BINGO TYPES There are many ways to earn bingos. 5 Across 5 Down 5 Diagonally 4 in the Corners Tip: Get more bingos to earn multi-bingo bonus points!
You are ready for a real match!
